pullRequest.title: Integrate JPA 3.0 Feature.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Initial drop for the jpa-3.0 feature.
JPA 2.1 FAT bucket EE9 selection disabled until JMS and MDB features are updated to Jakarta level
JPA 2.2 FAT bucket EE9 selection disabled until CDI is ready.
Does not update the Persistence Service yet (future PR for that)
for #11279

commit.message:
Integrate JPA 3.0 Feature.

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Please keep this file in alphabetical order
Rather than use "illegal," change to: "set to an unsupported value"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@

+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWSJX0000=CWSJX0000I: This is a message with inserts {0}
+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWSJX0000.explanation=Explanation text for the message
+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWSJX0000.useraction=User action text for the message
+#
+#CMVCPATHNAME org/eclipse/persistence/exceptions/i18n/BeanValidationExceptionResource.nlsprops
+#COMPONENTPREFIX None
+#COMPONENTNAMEFOR None - generated from open source project
+#ISMESSAGEFILE TRUE
+#NLS_ENCODING=UNICODE
+#
+# NLS_MESSAGEFORMAT_ALL
+#
+#   Strings in this file which contain replacement variables are processed by the MessageFormat
+#   class (single quote must be coded as 2 consecutive single quotes ''). Strings in this file 
+#   which do NOT contain replacement variables are NOT processed by the MessageFormat class 
+#   (single quote must be coded as one single quote '). 
+#
+# -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+7500=Bean validation mode on {0}marshaller is set to ON, but no Bean validation provider was found.
+
+7501=Bean validation mode on {0}marshaller is set to illegal value, "{1}".

nodes.bodyText: Change to: Cannot parse the {0} property because it is both annotated with @NotNull and has the "xs:nillable=true" attribute.
nodes.diffHunk:

+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWSJX0000.explanation=Explanation text for the message
+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWSJX0000.useraction=User action text for the message
+#
+#CMVCPATHNAME org/eclipse/persistence/exceptions/i18n/BeanValidationExceptionResource.nlsprops

+#ISMESSAGEFILE TRUE
+#NLS_ENCODING=UNICODE
+#

+#

+#   class (single quote must be coded as 2 consecutive single quotes ''). Strings in this file 
+#   which do NOT contain replacement variables are NOT processed by the MessageFormat class

+#

+7500=Bean validation mode on {0}marshaller is set to ON, but no Bean validation provider was found.
+
+7501=Bean validation mode on {0}marshaller is set to illegal value, "{1}".
+
+7510=Constraints violated on {0}marshalled bean:
+{1}{2}
+
+7525=Cannot parse property {0}, because it is both annotated with @NotNull and has attribute "xs:nillable=true".

nodes.bodyText:
Add a period to the end.
Global comment: If possible, use the format "the variable noun" thus "The {0} thread has a lock on the object but the {1} thread is building the object."

+2005=Wait failure on Sequencing Connection Handler for DatabaseSession.

nodes.bodyText:
Global comments:

Use "cannot" or "was not" instead of "could not"
If possible, use the format "the variable noun" thus "The [{0}] object of the [{1}] class cannot be converted to [{2}]."

nodes.bodyText:
Global comments:

Use "cannot" instead of "could not"
Use "might" instead of "may" unless denoting permission
If possible, use the format "the variable noun"

Also, add a period to the end and clarify the use of "setting" ("set"?). Suggested rewrite:
The [{0}] object of the [{1}] class cannot be converted to [{2}].  Ensure that the [{2}] class is on the CLASSPATH.  You might need to use alternate API passing in the appropriate class loader as required, or set it on the default ConversionManager.

commit.message:
Integrate JPA 3.0 Feature. #13077 : OSS Reorder and NLS Updates

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>
